# domain

**Type Property**

The error domain used by MetalKit when returning mesh initialization errors.

## Declaration

```swift
static let domain: MTKModelError
```

## Constants

- **key**: The key used to retrieve an error string from an error object’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError/userInfo] dictionary.

items.description: The key used to retrieve an error string from an error object’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError/userInfo] dictionary.
